description:
Manual games allow you to set custom check locations and custom item names that will be rolled into a multiworld.
This allows any variety of game -- PC, console, board games, Microsoft Word memes... really anything -- to be part of a multiworld randomizer.
The key component to including these games is some level of manual restriction. Since the items are not actually withheld from the player,
the player must manually refrain from using these gathered items until the tracker shows that they have been acquired or sent.

2025.11.10.description:
- NEW: Added a new option "pre_or_post_cataclysm" which will let you decide on what version of each zones are included in the pool. You might find this option interesting if you play old versions of the game with Vanilla, TBC or WOTLK.
  - Added each old zones and their level ranges for those earlier versions.
- CHANGED: Renamed the repo to "World of Warcraft Leveling" as you no longer specifically need the MoP version to run it
- CHANGED: The "easier_expansions_transition" was revamped to "easier_transitions", which now affects logic to requiring 2 zones for each level bracket to be in logic instead of 1, to give the players more choices over where they can quest. On top of that, it will continue to require the first zone for each expansion to be in logic.

**Full Changelog**: https://github.com/ChakraaThePanda/Archipelago-Manual-WorldofWarcraft-Leveling/compare/2025.11.01...2025.11.10
2025.11.10.title: 2025.11.10 - Old Expansions Client Compatibility

2025.11.11.description:
* CHANGED: Rebalanced the Pre-Cataclysm zones to be slightly easier, makes it so you should be a bit higher level than the zone you are entering to help with difficulty.

**Full Changelog**: https://github.com/ChakraaThePanda/Archipelago-Manual-WorldofWarcraft-Leveling/compare/2025.11.10...2025.11.11
2025.11.11.title: 2025.11.11 - Minor Patch - Pre-Cata Levels Rebalancing

2025.11.15.description:
* FIXED: Typo - Stonetalon Mountain -> Stonetalon Mountains

**Full Changelog**: https://github.com/ChakraaThePanda/Archipelago-Manual-WorldofWarcraft-Leveling/compare/2025.11.11...2025.11.15
2025.11.15.title: 2025.11.15 - Minor Patch - Typo Fix

2025.11.22.description:
- NEW: Added a new Gold Hunt goal, to differ from the full leveling experience. Now you can find the X amount of Gold items to Goal instead of having to level all the way to the max level
- NEW: Deathlink is now available in the YAML options.
- CHANGED: Cleaned up the options for the Pre/Post Cataclysm options

**Full Changelog**: https://github.com/ChakraaThePanda/Archipelago-Manual-WorldofWarcraft-Leveling/compare/2025.11.15...2025.11.22
2025.11.22.title: 2025.11.22 - Gold Hunt & Deathlink

2025.12.09.description:
* CHANGED: Monk is only available in when Post-Cataclysm is chosen
* CHANGED: Refactored Starting Class item to be in World.py instead of Game.json

**Full Changelog**: https://github.com/ChakraaThePanda/Archipelago-Manual-WorldofWarcraft-Leveling/compare/2025.11.22...2025.12.09
2025.12.09.title: 2025.12.09 - Monk Post-Cataclysm
